mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STAMP_RECORD ( user_id, target_type, target_id, auth_method, visited_at ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{targetType}, #{targetId}, #{authMethod}, #{visitedAt} )
mapper.select: SELECT record_id AS recordId, user_id AS userId, target_type AS targetType, target_id AS targetId, auth_method AS authMethod, visited_at AS visitedAt FROM STAMP_RECORD WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY visited_at DESC
